name: YORK PAID FIREMEN'S PENSION FUND BOARD OF YORK CITY, Pennsylvania, v. M. Kenneth LINDSEY, Appellant
name_abbreviation: York Paid Firemen's Pension Fund Board v. Lindsey

judges: Before ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
O’BRIEN, C.J., and WILKINSON, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: YORK PAID FIREMEN’S PENSION FUND BOARD OF YORK CITY, Pennsylvania, v. M. Kenneth LINDSEY, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Appeal 52 Pa.Cmwlth. 51, 415 A.2d 441, dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
O’BRIEN, C.J., and WILKINSON, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: James B. Leckrone, Carl H. Cordes, York, for appellant.
Donald B. Hoyt, York, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
430 A.2d 1151
YORK PAID FIREMEN’S PENSION FUND BOARD OF YORK CITY, Pennsylvania, v. M. Kenneth LINDSEY, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 21, 1981.
Decided June 4, 1981.
James B. Leckrone, Carl H. Cordes, York, for appellant.
Donald B. Hoyt, York, for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
